What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":109701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No.\""},{"lineNumber":109702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「孫とお出かけしてる気分」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Feels like going out with a grandchild.\""},{"lineNumber":109703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「デートだと言っとるだろうが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you, this is a date!\""},{"lineNumber":109704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……孫とデート。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...A date with a grandchild."},{"lineNumber":109705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それもいいな」","translatedEnglishLine":" That's not bad either.\""},{"lineNumber":109706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、そうではなく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not what I meant...\""},{"lineNumber":109707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……楽しいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's fun."},{"lineNumber":109708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とても楽しい」","translatedEnglishLine":" Very fun indeed.\""},{"lineNumber":109709,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビビッドはランスの腕の中で","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid, in Rance's arms,"},{"lineNumber":109710,"originalJapaneseLine":"心なしか嬉しそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow looked happy."},{"lineNumber":109711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……いいか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... I guess it's fine...\""},{"lineNumber":109712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あと、勘違いはするな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, don't get the wrong idea.\""},{"lineNumber":109713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":109714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は我慢続きの一生だったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My life was one of continual endurance,"},{"lineNumber":109715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不幸な一生だとは思っていない」","translatedEnglishLine":" but I don't think it was an unhappy life.\""},{"lineNumber":109716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「村も、娘達も、村人達も、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I loved the village, the daughters, and the villagers,"},{"lineNumber":109717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　好きだったからな」","translatedEnglishLine":" that's why.\""},{"lineNumber":109718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でなければ、誰が女王なぞやるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Otherwise, who would want to be queen?\""},{"lineNumber":109719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":109720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":109721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ふむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":109722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、婿殿の傍はいかんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, being near my son-in-law is troublesome.\""},{"lineNumber":109723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普段、心の奥に留めている言葉が溢れる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Words I usually keep deep inside spill out.\""},{"lineNumber":109724,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの胸にぐりぐりと","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid pressed her face firmly"},{"lineNumber":109725,"originalJapaneseLine":"鼻を擦りつけるようにビビッドが顔をうずめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"rubbing her nose against Rance's chest."},{"lineNumber":109726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カラーの元女王ではなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not the former queen of Kala,"},{"lineNumber":109727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただのビビッド・カラーになる」","translatedEnglishLine":" just Vivid Kala.\""},{"lineNumber":109728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは私にとって……とても麻薬だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is... like a drug to me.\""},{"lineNumber":109729,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういって、ビビッドは気持ち目を細めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying that, Vivid narrowed her eyes slightly in pleasure."},{"lineNumber":109730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、満足そうで何よりだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, as long as you're satisfied, that's what for me, this is less a date and more like...\""},{"lineNumber":109733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「娘を抱いてお出かけしてる気分？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Feels like going out carrying my daughter?\""},{"lineNumber":109734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「義理の祖母に当たる女に娘言うな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't call the woman who's your step-grandmother 'daughter'.\""},{"lineNumber":109735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お風呂お風呂♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bath, bath♪"},{"lineNumber":109736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははは、女の子はいるかなー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, I wonder if there are any girls♪\""},{"lineNumber":109737,"originalJapaneseLine":"女湯にランスが乱入した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance barged into the women's bath."},{"lineNumber":109738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん、婿殿か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Oh, son-in-law.\""},{"lineNumber":109739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　ビビッド？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Vivid?"},{"lineNumber":109740,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんで温泉に？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Why are you in the hot springs?\""},{"lineNumber":109741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット、モダンと入りに来た。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I came with Reset and Modern to bathe."},{"lineNumber":109742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幽霊だから意味はないが気分は味わえる」","translatedEnglishLine":" Since we're ghosts, it has no real meaning, but we can enjoy the feeling.\""},{"lineNumber":109743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット……と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset... and,"},{"lineNumber":109744,"originalJapaneseLine":"モダン？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Modern?\""},{"lineNumber":109745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":109746,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの目に映ったのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"What Rance saw was,"},{"lineNumber":109747,"originalJapaneseLine":"慌てて脱衣所に駆け込むモダンと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Modern hastily running into the changing room,"},{"lineNumber":109748,"originalJapaneseLine":"モダンに手を引かれるリセットの後ろ姿だけだった。","translatedEnglishLine":" and Reset being dragged along from behind by Modern."},{"lineNumber":109749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、くそ、逃げられた！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, damn it! They escaped!"},{"lineNumber":109750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっそり入ってくれば良かった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I should have sneaked in quietly!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱っこするポーズを取った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She struck a pose as if to be carried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうやって男女がイチャイチャするものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when a man and woman flirt like this."
"I don't really know how to do it.
I'll leave it to you, son-in-law."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、これはデートというか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, this is less like a date and more like..."
"Feels like going out with a grandchild."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「デートだと言っとるだろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you, this is a date!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビビッドはランスの腕の中で
心なしか嬉しそうだった。
「私は我慢続きの一生だったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My life was one of continual endurance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な一生だとは思っていない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I don't think it was an unhappy life."
"I loved the village, the daughters, and the villagers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でなければ、誰が女王なぞやるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Otherwise, who would want to be queen?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、婿殿の傍はいかんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, being near my son-in-law is troublesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普段、心の奥に留めている言葉が溢れる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Words I usually keep deep inside spill out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの胸にぐりぐりと
鼻を擦りつけるようにビビッドが顔をうずめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rubbing her nose against Rance's chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただのビビッド・カラーになる」
「それは私にとって……とても麻薬だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is... like a drug to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういって、ビビッドは気持ち目を細めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, Vivid narrowed her eyes slightly in pleasure.
"Well, as long as you're satisfied, that's what matters..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺としてもこれはデートというか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for me, this is less a date and more like..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「娘を抱いてお出かけしてる気分？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Feels like going out carrying my daughter?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「義理の祖母に当たる女に娘言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't call the woman who's your step-grandmother 'daughter'."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、女の子はいるかなー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, I wonder if there are any girls♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女湯にランスが乱入した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance barged into the women's bath.
Why are you in the hot springs?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、モダンと入りに来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came with Reset and Modern to bathe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幽霊だから意味はないが気分は味わえる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we're ghosts, it has no real meaning, but we can enjoy the feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの目に映ったのは、
慌てて脱衣所に駆け込むモダンと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Modern hastily running into the changing room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モダンに手を引かれるリセットの後ろ姿だけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Reset being dragged along from behind by Modern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり入ってくれば良かった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I should have sneaked in quietly!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
